Entries.fall_3{{YearRemainder}}: Mmmm nothing like some pumpkin pie around this time of year.[608]
Entries.fall_5{{YearRemainder}}: I feel like making potato gratin today...but it's so many dishes...
Entries.winter_12{{YearRemainder}}: Maybe I should take up knitting. Emily makes it look so relaxing.

Entries.2_2: Hey @, I made a bunch of extra roasted hazelnuts the other day. It's Kent's favorite food.%revealtasteKent607.#$b#Here, have some.$h[607]
Entries.17_2: Made something fancy today, but neither Kent nor Vincent would eat it. Here, have some.[618]
Entries.18_2: Watching the news makes me anxious. I know I shouldn't, but I watch anyways.
Entries.19_2: I got a recipe for steamed salmon and broccoli from Jodi that I'm dying to try out.

Entries.3_2: Kent wasn't around very much when the kids were growing up. Sometimes, we regret that.$s#$e#Oh well, can't change the past now.
Entries.5_2: I'd love to cook some new recipes every now and then, but I'm not sure Sam or Kent would eat them...$s

Entries.4_2: Between you and I, @, I wish we had a bit more money. Would make things a lot easier.
Entries.5_2: Our range broke. I'm...I'm not sure what to do, we don't have the money for this.$s
Entries.6_2: Kent's not getting any cost-of-living adjustments in his pension this year. I'm not sure what we're going to do.$s
Entries.17_2: Caroline's been trying to get me to start a garden too. She thinks it might be a good way for us to save some money.
Entries.25_2: To be honest, @, JojaOnline is so handy...being able to order anything online and getting it within two days...
